metadata.title: CVE-2021-25682 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
It was discovered that the get_pid_info() function in data/apport did notproperly parse the /proc/pid/status file from the kernel.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
apport-gtk - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
apport-kde - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
apport-noui - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
apport-retrace - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
apport-valgrind - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
dh-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
python-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
python-problem-report - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
python3-apport - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
python3-problem-report - 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.1-0ubuntu2.30').
